Text: Summer is heating up at AmeritradeDear James Schwieger Summer is heating up and so is Ameritrade Check out our new paperless delivery service complete your Exchange Agreements and get some ideas about how to tackle that future college expense GO PAPERLESS AND SAVE Receive an email notification of when your statement or the days trade confirmations are available online This service is fast convenient and FREE Simply log on to your account go to the myAccount or Account Services tab to subscribe Dont delay as previously communicated effective July a fee will be assessed for each trade confirmation sent to you via US Mail DONT LOSE YOUR REALTIME QUOTES To receive realtime quotes the Exchanges require that you complete the Exchange Agreements If you have not completed these agreements you will begin receiving delayed quotes on May To ensure that you continue to receive unlimited realtime quotes just log on to your account go to the Account Services tab and then under FormsDeposit Slip click on the Exchange Agreements link SAVING FOR THEIR FUTURE Graduation season is upon us Are you wondering how your child or grandchild will be able to afford college Learn more about how a UGMA or UTMA custodial account might be the answer Start saving for the future today with up to commissionfree Internet equity trades the first monthocgi Free online services unlimited realtime quotes commissionfree investing its how you get somewhere on Wall Streetsm Sincerely J Peter Ricketts President Ameritrade Inc All deposits into UGMAUTMAs are irrevocable gifts to the minor recipient UGMA accounts are offered in South Carolina and Vermont All other states and the District of Columbia offer UTMA accounts Please contact your tax advisor before choosing a UGMA or UTMA
